content.text:
# Recent ElizaOS Pull Requests

This summary covers recent pull requests to the ElizaOS repository, including bug fixes, features, and other updates.

## Features

- The Discord plugin now supports typing indicators (PR #4364)
- Added default project text to the create CLI command (PR #4369)
- Added API key validation for Anthropic Plugin model calls (PR #4383)
- Updated the ElizaOS create command instructions in the CLI (PR #4381)

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed ESM type declarations in Core (PR #4341)
- Resolved an issue with PostgreSQL database for Docker containers (PR #4363)
- Fixed broken image paths in multiple PRs (#4362, #4372)
- Corrected a broken Pump.fun link (PR #4367)
- Fixed escaped Docker compose PostgreSQL healthcheck (PR #4382)
- Updated a broken link to eliza-in-tee documentation (PR #4377)
- Added type checking for crypto values in core (PR #4376)
- Fixed Discord plugin to stop throwing errors when missing service (PR #4375)
- Resolved issues with short replies (PR #4374)
- Fixed "Cannot read properties of undefined" error related to sendStandartTweet (PR #4373)

## Other Updates

- Updated memory.ts to use the new schema (PR #4292)
- Added test coverage and setup for the Anthropic plugin (PR #4370)
- Updated quick start and intro CLI commands documentation (PR #4379)

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several important pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository:

1. PR #4384 by odilitime focuses on preparing the 0.x version for sharing plugins with the upcoming 1.x version, which will improve compatibility between versions.

2. PR #4374 by lalalune addresses an issue with short replies in the system, likely improving the quality of responses.

3. PR #4292 by jmikedupont2 updates the memory.ts file to use a new schema, suggesting improvements to how the system handles memory or data storage.

4. PR #4380 by UD1sto adds a Livepeer inference plugin package, expanding the system's capabilities with new functionality for video processing or streaming.

Current cryptocurrency prices:

- WETH (Wrapped Ethereum) is trading at $1,792.55
- SOL (Solana) is trading at $148.06

Between April 28-29, 2025, the elizaos/eliza repository saw significant activity with 15 new pull requests, 18 merged pull requests, and 21 active contributors. No new issues were reported during this period.
sources: text: From 2025-04-28 to 2025-04-29, elizaos/eliza had 15 new PRs (18 merged), 0 new issues, and 21 active contributors.

content.text: GitHub issue #4336 was opened by user eduardoPauloPanstein regarding documentation problems in the Quickstart guide for the elizaOS/eliza project. The issue appears to be related to problems or inconsistencies found in the quickstart documentation that need to be addressed.
